TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebHttpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public Class WebHttpBinding Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 一个绑定，可用于为通过 HTTP 请求（而不是 SOAP 消息）公开的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) Web 服务配置终结点。

span.span: A binding used to configure endpoints for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) Web services that are exposed through HTTP requests instead of SOAP messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web 编程模型允许开发人员通过 HTTP 请求（这些请求使用“纯旧式 XML”(POX) 样式消息，而不是使用基于 SOAP 的消息）来公开 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web 服务。The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web Programming Model allows developers to expose [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web services through HTTP requests that use "plain old XML" (POX) style messaging instead of SOAP-based messaging. 为了让客户端使用 HTTP 请求与服务进行通信，必须使用附加了 的 对服务的终结点进行配置。For clients to communicate with a service using HTTP requests, an endpoint of the service must be configured with the that has the attached to it. WCF Web 编程模型还要求使用 或 属性对各个服务操作进行批注。The WCF Web Programming Model also requires that the individual service operations are annotated with the or attributes. 这定义了从 URI 和 HTTP 方法到服务操作之间的映射，还定义了用于调用操作和返回结果的消息格式。This defines a mapping from a URI and HTTP method to the service operation, as well as the format of the messages used to call the operation and return the results. [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中的联合支持和 ASP.AJAX 集成都构建于 WCF Web 编程模型之上。Support in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] for syndication and ASP.AJAX integration are both built on top of the WCF Web Programming Model.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认安全模式为 ，指定未使用任何安全性。The default security mode is , which specifies that no security is used. 若要将传输级安全性用于使用此绑定配置的终结点，则 值必须指定为 构造函数中的一个参数。To use transport-level security for endpoints configured with this binding, the value must be specified as a parameter in the constructor. 若要使用 HTTP 而不是 HTTPS 进行身份验证，那么 值必须指定为 构造函数中的一个参数。To use HTTP authentication without HTTPS, the value must be specified as a parameter in the constructor. 在创建绑定实例之后，不能再次设置 的值。The value of cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将传输级安全性用于使用此绑定配置的终结点，则 值必须指定为 构造函数中的一个参数。To use transport-level security for endpoints configured with this binding, the value must be specified as a parameter in the constructor. 若要使用 HTTP 而不是 HTTPS 进行身份验证，那么 值必须指定为 构造函数中的一个参数。To use HTTP authentication without HTTPS, the value must be specified as a parameter in the constructor. 在创建绑定实例之后，不能再次设置 的值。The value of cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.

exception.span: 指定的 不是有效的 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowCookies { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示客户端是否接受 Cookie 并根据今后的请求传播 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

value.span: 如果接受 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if cookies are allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性是为了便于使用包括在 HTTP 头中的 Cookie。This property is provided as a convenience for using cookies included in HTTP headers. 如果客户端通过将属性设置为 `true` 接受 Cookie，则从服务器返回的 Cookie 会复制到今后对该服务发出的所有客户端请求。When cookies are accepted by the client by setting the property to `true`, cookies returned from the server are automatically copied to all future client requests to that service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1<!!TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection parameters) cil managed

summary.span: 在客户端上生成通道工厂堆栈，此通道工厂堆栈创建具有指定类型的通道并满足绑定参数集合所指定的功能。

span.span: Builds the channel factory stack on the client that creates a specified type of channel and that satisfies the features specified by a collection of binding parameters.

span.span: An of type TChannel that satisfies the features specified by the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BypassProxyOnLocal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对本地地址不使用代理服务器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

value.span: 如果对本地地址不使用代理服务器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Internet 资源具有本地地址，则该资源是本地资源。An Internet resource is local if it has a local address. 本地地址是指位于同一台计算机、 本地 LAN 或 intranet 上和标识，语法上通过省略句点 （.） 如 Uri"http://webserver/"和"http://localhost/"。A local address is one that is on same computer, the local LAN or intranet and is identified, syntactically, by the lack of a period (.) as in the URIs "http://webserver/" and "http://localhost/". 通过设置 属性可以确定在访问本地资源时，采用 进行配置的终结点是否使用代理服务器。Setting the property determines whether endpoints configured with the use the proxy server when accessing local resources. 如果 为 `true`，则对本地 Internet 资源的请求不使用代理服务器。If is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server. 为 `false` 时，所有 Internet 请求都通过代理服务器进行。When is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server.

Public Overrides Function CreateBindingElements () As BindingElementCollection

summary.span: 返回一个包含在当前绑定中的已排序的绑定元素集合。

span.span: Returns an ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含绑定的 对象。

span.span: A that contains the objects for the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绑定元素的顺序很重要。The order of the binding elements is important. 它反映了构造和堆栈协议以及传输通道的顺序。It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked.

span.span: The value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示忽略匹配项中的主机名。

span.span: The default value is , which ignores the hostname in the match.

exception.span: 所设置的值不是有效的 值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可为缓冲区管理器分配的最大内存量（以字节为单位），该管理器管理使用此绑定的终结点所需的缓冲区。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated, in bytes, for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints that use this binding.

value.span: 配置了此绑定的终结点所使用的缓冲池的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for the pool of buffers used by an endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: 默认值为 65,536 字节。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试利用缓冲池将使用缓冲区的成本降至最低。The tries to minimize the cost of using buffers with a buffer pool. 当消息离开通道时，服务需要使用缓冲区来处理这些消息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果缓冲池中的内存不足，无法处理消息负载，则 必须从 CLR 堆分配更多内存，而这会增加垃圾回收的系统开销。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 从 CLR 垃圾堆进行大量分配表明缓冲池太小，可以通过提高 限制来实现更大的内存分配，从而提高性能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为从通道接收消息的消息缓冲区管理器分配并供其使用的最大内存量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory, in bytes, that is allocated for use by the manager of the message buffers that receive messages from the channel.

value.span: 可供消息缓冲区管理器使用的最大内存量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum amount of memory, in bytes, available for use by the message buffer manager.
The default value is 524,288 (0x80000) bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用缓冲池， 将使用缓冲区的成本降至最低。The minimizes the cost of using buffers by using a buffer pool. 当消息离开通道时，服务需要使用缓冲区来处理这些消息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果缓冲池中的内存不足，无法处理消息负载，则 必须从 CLR 堆分配更多内存，而这会增加垃圾回收的系统开销。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 从 CLR 垃圾堆进行大量分配表明缓冲池太小，可以通过提高 限制来实现更大的内存分配，从而提高性能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit.

exception.span: 设置的值小于或等于零。

span.span: The value set is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置绑定可处理的消息的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be processed by the binding.

value.span: 绑定可处理的最大消息大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.

value.span: 默认值为 65,536 字节。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 的服务能够在网络上接收的消息的大小受为每个消息分配的内存量的限制。The size of the messages that can be received on the wire by services using the is bounded by the amount of memory allocated for each message. 对消息大小进行的此限制旨在降低遭受拒绝服务 (DoS) 攻击的可能性。This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to denial of service (DoS) attacks.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

exception.span: 消息超出分配的最大大小。

span.span: A message exceeded the maximum size allocated.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 设置为 `true`，则将忽略 的值。If the is set to `true`, the value of is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ ReaderQuotas { System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定的终结点处理的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 指定复杂性约束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示这些约束的属性及其默认值（以字节表示）如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

span.span: The value set is .
The quota values of are read only.

exception.span: 设置的配额必须为正数。

span.span: The quotas set must be positive.
